mapper.sql:
FROM oyMember a LEFT JOIN oymbPhone b on b.oympSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbEmail c on c.oymeSeq = a.oymbSeq
WHERE 1=1
AND a.OymbGenderCd = 3 AND a.OymbGenderCd = 4 AND a.OymbGenderCd = 5
AND a.oymbName LIKE concat('%',#{scOymbName},'%')
AND a.oymbName LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%') AND a.oymbNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.oymbSeq , a.oymbId , a.oymbName , a.oymbGenderCd ,(select oycdName from oyCode b where oycdSeq = a.oymbGenderCd) as oymbGender , b.oympNumber , c.oymeEmailFull
limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}

SELECT a.oymbSeq , a.oymbName , a.oymbId , a.oymbPassword
, oymbDelNy FROM oyMember WHERE 1=1 AND oymbDelNy = 0 AND oymbSeq = #{oymbSeq}
